title: Chiropractic Clinic DeWitt MI
description: Balance Your Life Chiropractic is a Premier Chiropractic Office located in DeWitt MI. Trust our trained professionals to make sure you get the best care.
cleaned_text: Chiropractic Clinic DeWitt MI At Balance Your Life Chiropractic, we believe in treating the individual, not just the condition. Our mission is to provide our patients with customized care as well as the education and tools needed for improved health and well-being. A pain-free, balanced body and mind allows you to keep doing the things you love. We're here to help you find that balance through customized chiropractic care, nutritional support, and other treatment modalities. We confidently treat all musculoskeletal injuries and specialize in prenatal and pediatric chiropractic care. Plus, we offer in-house Reiki, reflexology, craniosacral, and massage therapies. Chiropractic Techniques At our chiropractic clinic, we use a variety of adjustment techniques, including the Diversified Chiropractic Technique (DCT), the Activator Method, and drop bench assisted adjustments. Though each style is different, they're all used to achieve the same goal: restore proper joint function to the spine and/or affected extremities. We Listen. We Care. We Help. Our team is committed to treating you like family and helping you achieve greater health. Begin your journey to wellness today at Balance Your Life Chiropractic. For more information or to schedule an appointment, call the Balance Your Life Chiropractic office today at (517) 668-6215. Primary Communities Served DeWitt Lansing Saint Johns Grand Ledge
